name: A Dangerous Errand
description:
In a world on the verge of extinction due to an unknown virus, a young hero must fulfill his duty by staying at home. However, after using his last roll of toilet paper, he's left with no choice but to go on a mighty quest to refill his stock.

Protect yourself and many others by following the safety mesures and throwing face masks at coughing people's face and use every tool at your disposal to make your way to the nearest market.

THE GAME

CONTROLS

CREDITS

Soap, toilets rolls, shields market icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com

Cart icons made by Smashicons from www.flaticon.com

||STAY HOME, STAY SAFE, HAVE A GOOD TIME||
